header.name: Bryanna Gardner
header.title: UI Engineer / Front-End Engineer
header.description: Crafting innovative and scalable web solutions with 8+ years of expertise in React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Bridging design and engineering to create seamless, accessible digital experiences.

about.label: About
about.title: Transforming UI concepts into seamless user experiences
paragraphs: Hi, my name is Bryanna, and I am a full-stack engineer with a passion for creating beautiful, intuitive, and scalable digital experiences. I blend my background in UI and UX research with modern engineering practices to bring thoughtful products to life.

I bring more than eight years of experience across design, user research, web development, and full software engineering. My journey began with UI and UX research paired with marketing studies, which shaped how I think about users and the stories digital products tell.

I expanded that foundation at Washtenaw Community College, where I earned hands-on training and certifications in Web Design and Development. I worked deeply with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, and PHP, and realized I wanted to build products that combined strong design with clean engineering.

My career grew through marketing management and web design roles before evolving into full software engineering positions. Over time, I gained experience building responsive, accessible, and high-quality interfaces across a variety of industries. My work today focuses on modern frontend development using React, TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, and component-driven architectures.

I specialize in translating high-fidelity concepts into production-ready experiences with a focus on scalability, performance, and design systems. I love creating interfaces that feel intentional, polished, and human, supported by clean code and thoughtful engineering patterns.

I am currently open to mid-level and senior UI and Frontend Engineering opportunities where I can contribute to impactful products and collaborate with teams who value quality, creativity, and strong execution.

achievements: Developed and launched product sites for new fund offerings during a rollout that saw first day trading volume exceed $55 million

Partnered with design and backend teams to implement performance optimizations, reducing average load times and improving Core Web Vitals
Spearheaded the development of a reusable React + TypeScript component library, streamlining development workflows across teams

Utilized WebRTC to build and enhance interactive video and live-streaming user experiences
Worked on B2B engineering initiatives, implementing dashboards and internal tooling interfaces using React and TypeScript

Collaborated with product, design, and engineering teams to elevate UX and modernize web experiences
Designed and developed responsive marketing websites and web applications for 6+ agency clients
Improved performance, accessibility, and SEO across client platforms using modern best practices
Collaborated closely with designers and project managers to deliver polished, high-impact client work
Developed and maintained internal and client-facing web applications for recruiting technology products
Managed project timelines and coordinated cross-functional workflows between marketing, product, and engineering
Shipped user-centered digital experiences that supported brand growth and lead generation
Led creative strategy and designed print + digital campaigns from concept to production
Owned branding, content creation, and marketing collateral across web, email, social, and in-office materials
Built and maintained vendor, supplier, and media relationships while tracking KPIs and campaign performance
Managed website content and social platforms, driving engagement and supporting business growth
Created and maintained digital assets and web content for one of Ann Arborâ€™s most well-known brands

cta.title: Let's Build Something Great Together
cta.description: I'm actively seeking new opportunities to create impactful user experiences. Whether you're looking for a UI Engineer, Frontend Developer, or design-minded engineer, I'd love to hear from you.
